Puts a comforting hand on Nekhorvich's shoulder, engages calmly in conversation despite tense circumstances.

Removes the vocal oscillator and clears throat to impersonate Sean Ambrose, demonstrating cleverness and undercover skills.

Free-climbs a sheer rock face of at least a thousand feet with relaxed confidence, appearing engaged and at ease despite the danger.
Catches a lizard to prevent it from falling to its death and then releases it safely, acknowledging it with a friendly comment.
Flattens himself against the rock when spotting a helicopter overhead, indicating caution but no hostility or aggression.

Maintains calm and relaxed demeanor despite precarious handholds and dangerous climb.

Stops Nyah to remind her about the necklace she forgot, showing attentiveness and sincerity.
Gives a professional and polite report to Senor de l'Arena without disrespect or arrogance.
Notices the alarm sensors were triggered late, deducing the alarm sensitivity is too low and recommends recalibration to respond to a lighter load.
Maintains professionalism and tact when dealing with Senor de l'Arena and Nyah, managing a potentially tense situation gracefully.
Remembers to retrieve the necklace with Nyah before leaving, indicating attention to detail and situational awareness.

Admits he triggered the alarm but references a previous flawless job to demonstrate confidence and skill.
Engages Nyah in a frank conversation about past mistakes and future cooperation, showing strategic thinking and emotional intelligence.
Lets Nyah complete the task even after a botched job, using it as a test of her capabilities.

Uses repeated phone calls and insists repeatedly despite Nyah's dismissiveness, potentially bordering on persistence versus harassment.
